content: **this is unique ribbed cowl design that includes a fun edging that uses bobbles and picots to create the points ** > use code **get1off** at checkout or use the code **20off3** when you add 3 or more patterns to your cart **size** adult one size **skill level** easy skills and techniques used include - working in the round working in row working in the third loop following instructions for 2 special stitches **yarn** #3 dk weight 1 skein 220 yards martin s lab comfy dk in poltergeist or suitable substitute **hook size** us size h/8 5 0 mm or size needed to obtain gauge **other** read through all of the pattern notes before beginning and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet *this pattern has been tested to ensure accuracy * copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
